dmca.title: [ABUSE] abbyinvestment.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 2004 10:11 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] abbyinvestment.com]

Forwarding to Legal for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] abbyinvestment.com
Date: Thu, 16 Sep 2004 15:54:15 +0100
From: Sparrow, Katie <Katie.Sparrow@abbey.com>
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com' <abuse@theplanet.com>


I work in the legal department of Abbey National plc, and have recently
become aware of the name abbyinvestment.com, which is hosted on:

dns.hosthat.com        67.19.193.90

The name is registered to a 3rd party not associated with Abbey National.

There are various spelling mistakes and contradictions within the site,
which also quotes the registered office in Jersey and Cayman Islands. The
company registration number provided is invalid.

The whois details provide 'Emmanuel Omoruyi' as the Admin contact for this
name.

The site also uses the registered trade mark AIB, which is owned by Allied
Irish Bank and not Abbey Investment Banking. I have contacted Allied Irish
Bank to inform them of the trade mark infringement.

The site appears to be a fraudulent website set up as part of a
lottery/investment scam attempting to pass off as Abbey and Allied Irish
Bank

Access to this site could originally be obtained through the domain
abbeyinvestment.com, but we arranged for the ISP to suspend the account,
hence the new registration of abbyinvestment.com with a different ISP.

I would be most grateful if you could arrange for the site to be taken down
in line with your acceptable use policy.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards
Katie Sparrow.

Katie Sparrow
Lawyer
Legal, Abbey
Tel: +44 (0) 1908 348202 Fax: +44 (0) 1908 348246
email: katie.sparrow@abbey.com
Genesis House, 301-349 Midsummer Boulevard, Milton Keynes MK9 2JE




Emails aren't always secure, and they may be intercepted or changed 
after they've been sent. Abbey doesn't accept liability if this happens. 
If you think someone may have interfered with this email, please get in 
touch with the sender another way.

This message doesn't create or change any contract. Abbey doesn't accept 
responsibility for damage caused by any viruses contained in this email 
or its attachments. Emails may be monitored.

If you've received this email by mistake, please let the sender know at 
once that it's gone to the wrong person and then destroy it without 
copying, using, or telling anyone about its contents.

Abbey National plc Reg. No 2294747, and Inscape Investments Limited Reg. 
No. 3839455 are registered in England and have their Registered Offices 
at Abbey National House, 2 Triton Square, Regent's Place, London, NW1 3AN.

Abbey National plc and Inscape Investments Limited are authorised and 
regulated by the Financial Services Authority. Abbey National plc only 
advises on its own life assurance, pension and collective investment 
scheme products. Inscape Investments Limited is a member of the Abbey 
Marketing Group and provides OEICS, PEPS and ISAs. Abbey and Inscape are 
registered trademarks of Abbey National plc.



-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
